subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Tuukka Rask allowed a quick goal but stopped 34 shots, and the Bruins beat the Flyers to take a commanding 3-0 lead in their Eastern Conference semifinal series.
snippet: Tuukka Rask allowed a quick goal but stopped 34 shots, and the Bruins beat the Flyers to take a commanding 3-0 lead in their Eastern Conference semifinal series.
